messages.subject: Late Intro
messages.msgSnippet: I have responded to a few questions and have even asked one but I have not actually introduced myself and family. My name is Tammy and am married to Scott. We
messages.messageBody:
I have responded to a few questions and have even asked one but I have not
actually introduced myself and family. My name is Tammy and am married to
Scott. We have two boys, Jake(10) and Adam(6). We have been unschooling
since I heard the term and knew that's what we were doing for the most part
anyway. I am still learning and growing and striving for a more balanced
perspective as my kids are growing older. I have been meaning to get on this
list for at least 10 months, since the last Live and Learn conference and am
glad I finally did.



Tammy



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
